com.model.board.shape

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Dimension2D
      • java.awt.Dimension
        • com.model.board.shape.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle, Square

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.awt.Dimension
    This class is for creating board size.
    Here We implement 2 sub class that you can use to create the board.
    1. Square - This class will create the square which is both row and column are equal.
    2. Rectangle - This class will create the rectangle size which is row and column not necessary to be equal.

    Important: The Default of Row and Column, you can find in DEFAULT_HEIGHT and DEFAULT_WIDTH.

    Since:
    Fri 24/Feb/2017 - 11:56 PM
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    kamontat
